greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Minimal number of numbers in A000332 = { C(k,4); k=1,2,3,... } whose sum equals n.
comment: Analog, for A000332 = {C(n,4)}, of A061336 (for triangular numbers A000217) and A104246 (for tetrahedral numbers A000292).
link: Hyun Kwang Kim, On regular polytope numbers, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 131 (2003), p. 65-75. DOI:10.1090/S0002-9939-02-06710-2.
formula: a(n) <= 8 = a(64) for all n, cf. Kim paper.
program: (PARI) {a(n,k=4,M=9e9,N=n) = (n <= k || M <= k+1) && return(n); for(m=k,M,binomial(m,k)>n && (M=m) && break); M-- <= k && return(n); my(b=binomial(M,k),c=binomial(M-1,k),NN); forstep( nn=n\b,0,-1, if(N>NN=nn+g(n-nn*b,k,M,N,d),N=NN); n-(nn-1)*b >= (N-nn+1)*c && break); N}
xref: Cf. A000332 = {C(n,4)}; A061336 (analog for triangular numbers A000217), A104246 (analog for tetrahedral numbers A000292).
results.author: _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 06 2017
